LanguageData.InsectivoreFeeder.label: insectivore feeder
LanguageData.InsectivoreFeeder.description: An automated feeding system designed to dispense sustenance for insectivores. Cost more than a small feeder, but dispenses larger amounts of food.
LanguageData.InsectivoreFeederSmall.label: small insectivore feeder
LanguageData.InsectivoreFeederSmall.description: A small automated feeding system designed to dispense sustenance for insectivores. Cost less than a normal feeder, but dispenses smaller amounts of food.
